TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 用作设计器的基类，这些设计器在可视 Web 设计器中为 抽象类派生的控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Web 设计器中，当用户从源切换到设计视图中，描述控件的标记源代码派生自类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类用作基类的派生自的控件提供 Visual Web 设计器中的设计时支持的设计器。The class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the . 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自在继承树中的设计器的每个级别的对象。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 并属性提供对派生自的控件的相应属性的访问类。The and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the class. 和指示的字段的数据源提供的文本和分别值列表项的内容。The and indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法将派生自该关联的控件绑定与设计时数据源。The method binds the associated control that is derived from the to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. - 方法返回设计时组件从关联的控件容器。The method returns the design-time component from the associated control container. - 方法将返回中的控件容器中解析为设计时控件的属性。The method returns the from the control container, resolved to the design-time property of the control. - 方法准备设计器，以查看和设计关联的控件派生自。The method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the . - 时调用方法关联的控件发生更改。The method is called when the for the associated control has changed. - 方法用于删除从其他属性、 添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件派生自的属性。The method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the . ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何派生自定义控件设计器。The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer. 第二个演示如何将派生的控件与设计器相关联。The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为类`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`，它继承自类。The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the class. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`类将重写， ，和方法。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the , , and methods. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`类显示`SimpleRadioButtonList`设计图面上的控件。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例派生`SimpleRadioButtonList`控件从控件，并演示如何使用类，以将相关联`SimpleRadioButtonList`控件与其设计`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`类。The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the control, and shows how to use the class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建派生自的关联的控件时设计图面上的类。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class on the design surface.

summary.span: 将指定的控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关基类，方法设置并的属性对象引用设计时数据源，然后调用方法，然后还原和为其原始值的属性。For the base class, the method sets the and properties of the object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the method, and then restores the and properties to their original values. 有关类，但是，方法没有任何功能，因为对象只是已添加到集合。For the class, however, the method has no functionality, because objects were just added to the collection.

The property of the list control.

member this.DataTextField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的数据文本字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置或检索用于在运行时的控件的设计时表示的标记。The property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time. 这提供了通过设计器来访问关联控件，对应于提供的列表项的文本内容的数据源字段的属性。This provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataValueField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataValueField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的数据值字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可以通过设计器来访问指示提供的列表项值内容的数据源的字段的关联控件属性。The property provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 派生的控件的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the control derived from the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关联的控件派生自对象是数据绑定方法将清除集合，并将添加条消息，指示该控件数据绑定。If the associated control derived from the object is data-bound, the method clears the collection and adds a message indicating the control is data-bound. 如果关联的控件是非数据绑定和集合为空，添加，该值指示该控件未绑定的消息。If the associated control is not data-bound and the collection is empty, the adds a message indicating the control is unbound. 然后，调用基方法来生成标记。Then, the calls its base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写方法以自定义为关联控件在设计图面上显示的标记。The following code example overrides the method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface. 如果属性未定义为关联的控件，设置为`Gainsboro`，并以该背景色显示控件。If the property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color. 此操作完成的的基实现后调用方法。After this is done, the base implementation of the method is called. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`null`如果找不到属性，或者如果不存在具有相同的名称。The method returns `null` if a property is not found, or if a with the same name does not exist. 如果不能被解析为关联控件的属性返回接口包含设计时。If the cannot be resolved to the property of the associated control, the returns an interface containing the design-time .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A control derived from the that implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主调用方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现控件派生自类。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法后其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器的操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是派生自控件的与此设计器关联，或该控件的副本。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写方法在设计器中派生自类，以确保只有控件类的实例名为`SimpleRadioButtonList`由自定义设计器。The following code example overrides the method in a designer derived from the class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object source, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object source, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (source As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ source, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The source of the event.
The event data.
Raises the ComponentChanged event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理对组件所做的更改。Handles changes made to the component. 这包括在属性网格中所做的更改。This includes changes made in the property grid.

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的关联的控件的基本方法连接对象与当前的数据源和，如果是从数据源连接控件的不同，更新的设计时标记。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 方法与当前的数据源建立连接后更新的设计时标记。The method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写继承的类中方法类。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 与设计器类更改的数据时，它是源相关联调用方法，此代码将设置一个名为变量`changedDataSource`到`true`。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

param.name: forceUpdateView

This parameter is ignored.

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的关联的控件的基本方法连接到当前的数据源的类和，如果是从数据源连接控件的不同，更新的设计时标记。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 设计器的方法与当前的数据源建立连接后会无条件地更新设计时标记。The method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. 值`forceUpdateView`将被忽略。The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写继承的类中方法类。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 与设计器类更改的数据时，它是源相关联调用，此代码将设置一个名为变量`changedDataSource`到`true`。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 调用方应使用公共重写。

span.span: Callers should use the public override.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现已添加或隐藏属性 的集合，在设计时为关联控件公开。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中删除或添加属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 控件派生自对象，添加归于和关联控件的属性。For controls that are derived from the object, the adds the attribute to the and properties of the associated control.

para.span: 重写方法将属性添加到或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示关联控件是否应呈现其默认操作列表。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`false`，以便数据源下拉列表中不显示与**选择数据源**中的菜单项**常见任务**上下文菜单。The property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu. 相反，此菜单项将显示**选择数据源**对话框中，这样用户就可以选择并且和属性。Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a and the and properties.

para.span: 重写属性返回如果您希望控件派生自类，以显示与一个数据源下拉列表**选择数据源**中的菜单项**常见任务**在设计时的上下文菜单。

span.span: Override the property to return if you want the control that is derived from the class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
